entry.title: OREGON LOTTERY PROFITS RETURN $900 MILLION TO STATE
entry.summary: November 16, 2023 4:00 a.m. The Oregon Lottery will return nearly $900 million to the state for the 2023 fiscal year – down slightly from the previous year due to an increase in operating costs.
